website_summaries.verdict: Osiris equips the Protocol with the essential skating requirements. This slightly bulky silhouette features a reinforced nubuck-mesh upper and a thickly padded tongue and collar. It sits atop a supportive, yet flexible VKLN cupsole (a vulc-cupsole hybrid). More so, an EVA drop-in midsole accommodates an impact-resistant heel insert.As simple and subtle as it looks, the Protocol has some double-stitch details and micro-perforations throughout. It adds durability and breathability. Moreover, a dual-density PU RX insole cushions the feet. Underneath that is the grippy herringbone-tread outsole. This skate shoe sits at only $56.
pros: The Osiris Protocol is budget-friendly, pleasing a lot of shoppers
Its vintage low-profile skate silhouette looks so cool and stylish with any casual clothing, according to many wearers
A good deal of customers proudly share about getting loads of compliments when putting on the Osiris Protocol
Some testers remark that it’s comfortable
Others noted that the shoe is lightweight to wear
This sneaker has tons of support, cushioning, and padding that protect the feet, according to some reviews
Its perforations make it a fairly breathable nubuck leather sneaker, a skate shoe reviewer has pointed out and recommended it for the summer season
Several customers like to wear the Protocol as a staple sneaker for daily work
More than a handful of buyers are so delighted with its variety of colorways that they plan on getting different pairs
A few users mention that it has excellent grip
cons: A considerable number of users bring up durability issues after a month or two of wear: soles falling off unglued, seams ripping and fraying
A handful of wearers complain that the Protocol fits too snug, particularly in the toe area, and recommend going up half a size

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Yeah. These shoes are cheap. I've had these for only a month, and only have worn them on my days off work; I think I've worn them for several days total. The soles are already coming unglued after what has been very light wear. What is especially disappointing is that I've had other Osiris shoes in the past and they have been durable and bulletproof. I'll pay extra for a good shoe, but these shoes have not lived up to my expectations. However, my return window closed just a few days ago, so I'm stuck with gluing these things back together.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Soooo uncomfortable. I really like Osiris and loved my last pair. I was so sad when they finally wore out. I thought these would be a good replacement, they look good but after walking around in them, not even skating, quickly realized they were not like my last pair. My feet hurt a lot after wearing them for a day. Most uncomfortable skate shoes I’ve ever worn in my 18 years of wearing skate shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tinker99206

customer_reviews.title: All Glitter...No Gold 👎🏽
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way these look. But in terms of the way the feel and the craftsmanship, it’s complete crap. Shoes are already coming unglued from simple walking and lots of threading that should have been cut. Just tells me they’re mass manufactured in a factory where quality and pride don’t exist. I’ve owned a pair of Osiris like 10 years ago and gave them another chance after my Vans crapped out after 1 year, but these crapped out in months...would never buy any Osiris shoe again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Lugo

customer_reviews.title: They look great but there are some workmanship issues with osiris shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ran a bit small so I exchanged them for a 1/2 size bigger and that did the trick. They look great but there are some workmanship issues with osiris shoes. Ex the hole for the lace is poorly matched with the cloth on the back so you have to rummage a bit to get the lace through. I only wear them to walk around town in style but if i wanted these for some aggressive activity i might think twice. For $50 I hope they survive at least 6mos but they look cool enough that i took a chance and also bought a red/black pair. Wish me luck!
customer_reviews.author: Arlitoooo

customer_reviews.title: Bummed out
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. Like the way they look the only issue is I do believe they were used cause the shoe lace holes have wear marks on them. Not a big deal but definitely a bummer. Wouldn't order it again but to me it's not worth the hassle of returning so I'll probably just use them as my every day skate shoes instead of my chilling going out shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not Purchase! Entire shoe sole falls off!
customer_reviews.text: What an Aweful Shoe!!! The shoe sole completely fell off only after wearing them for a couple hours! We were left with a moccasin. We tried to glue it back on, but it kept coming right off. Working on a full refund now.
customer_reviews.author: Yoli Colyer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Materials
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these shoes less than 90 times and the heel already blew out on both shoes! I don't expect a terribly long life out of skate shoes, but this is ridiculous. All I have done is walk in them. On top of the poor craftsmanship, they are incredibly hot because of all the added foam. I will not get Osiris shoes again after this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap shoes
customer_reviews.text: Now I haven't worn Osiris shoes for about five years, I use to wear pixels to their death, but was shocked to experience first hand how cheap their sneakers are made now. These shoes are a great looking sneaker, so much so that I was going to buy a second pair and now glad that I didn't. I was warned by reviews that the soles might come off but was hoping that it wouldn't happen to me. Well it took only a week before it happened. Don't buy, it's not worth the aggravation of returning them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shorthouse

customer_reviews.title: Too small?
customer_reviews.text: I've read that as you get older your feet get larger, esp if you are over 40. I'm 74 and have been having a lot of trouble buying an online shoe that's large enough. When I was younger I could wear a 11. But lately 11 is too small. This time I bought a 12 and still too small, about 1 size too small so I returned the 12s and ordered 13s. Also it's possible that synthetic leather has no stretch to it. Other than that, it's a beautfiul shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it looks like an animal attacked it
customer_reviews.text: These shoes made it two months before the sole of the right foot has almost totally separated from the rest of the shoe. It's totally ruined, it looks like an animal attacked it, and I only wear them around the house for the most part. There are some serious quality control issues going on here I imagine. Look at the picture I posted, I tilted the shoe specifically to show the light coming through.
customer_reviews.author: Allison H.

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Price
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through two pairs of these shoes and have a third on the way. They do last a significant amount of time for shoes but I know I'm hard on my shoes as I live in Colorado and am an outdoors person. I'd say each pair lasts at least 8 months to a year. And I personally don't mind spending only 40 bucks for something I can use for that long. I've tried a different model of the Protocol every time and each one has been comfortable and up to expectations. If your looking into a Protocol shoe that's within 30 to 45 bucks (or cheaper), I must say they are an excellent deal.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money! I got these for my son who wears them around school-walking in a high school to and from class only-and the sole completely separated from the body of the shoe within two and a half months. They wouldn’t do a thing either! Not happy for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jodway

customer_reviews.title: the box it came in looked like it came right out of the Wasteland in the ...
customer_reviews.text: A little tight in the sides of the big toe, but that'll go away once they're worn in. Got freakin' silica everywhere though, one of the bags was burst and I'll tell you, the box it came in looked like it came right out of the Wasteland in the Fallout Franchise...pretty beat to hell. Otherwise, the shoes are in new condition and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sean O.

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look great. No glue showing or loose fiber strands. People said they run small and to order a half size bigger so I did and they fit perfect. If these shoes do not hold up to normal wear, I will update this review
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes and it's actually my second time buying them. I ordered the gray since I had the black before. I used my prime and had them in two days. However, I was totally dissatisfied with the shoes themselves. The logo on the back of the shoes, was all scraped up along with some other parts of the sole. There are also spots of the shoes that are frayed. These shoes don't look like new, which is unacceptable. Someone should have looked over the shoes before sending them out. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Low quality cheap shoes
customer_reviews.text: Osiris badge on heal started coming unglued within 6 days of wearing them as pointed out in other reviews. The toes on both shoes are separating from the souls after 4 weeks of wearing them. When I say seperating I mean the entire side of the left shoe has opened up enough to place 4 fingers in the gap. They look new but are falling apart. If you pay more than $10 for these I would say you're paying to much. These are the worst quality shoes I remember ever buying and honestly I have never had shoes fall apart like this. Don't be fooled by how they look. Buy something else or you'll regret it.
customer_reviews.author: PizzaMan

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: these shoes are awful quality.
customer_reviews.text: The toe gets a little tight- the rest of the show fits very nicely but the toe squeezes. UPDATE: this became 1 star. Babied these shoes. Never wore them in the rain or snow. Didn't walk long distances in them. Fourth time I put them on and the canvas ripped on both shoes. Holes right through to the foot. I have two WORTHLESS, new looking shoes with HOLES in them.
customer_reviews.author: J Howe

customer_reviews.title: LEFT SHOE DOESN'T FIT RIGHT, IT'S TOO TIGHT
customer_reviews.text: The left shoe was put together wrong, it's WAY too tight. I've requested to return the product and have been told I need to pay shipping. I uploaded pictures showing how the shoe is defective but have yet to hear a response from the seller as to why I have to pay the damn shipping to return a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morin

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes, A little Snug, But They Stretch
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 13, and they fit a little snugly across the toes. After just a week of wear and skating, however, they have loosened up nicely. These shoes seem to be well made and, for the short time that I have used them, have held up well. I am liking the way they look and wouldn't hesitate to order another pair down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Big Rip

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 6 1/2 in men’s but went a 1/2 size up , they fit perfect. They are perfect , packaged great .
customer_reviews.author: crystal payne

customer_reviews.title: defective shoes
customer_reviews.text: i dont like these shoes, they fit ok, squeeze my right toes a bit and i think the right one is actually is a defect because it don't look the same as the other(plus it squeezes my toes) it has foam coming out of the tongue, and they were shipped out after being tight-ind super tight overall not a very good seller and bad shoes
customer_reviews.author: elijah

customer_reviews.title: Skated well
customer_reviews.text: These skated really well for me and were priced right at the time I purchased them which I had gotten them twice the bottoms wore out sooner than expected which was a month and half
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Funny shape for a shoe. Not good.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why they would ever make a pointy shoe like this, the design is silly unless you want squished toes or need to be able to climb fences with these shoes on. I have seen cowboy boots that gave your toes more room. The length of the shoe is correct it's the shape and i even went up a size. :/
customer_reviews.author: Michigan buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material
customer_reviews.text: Look good and made of good quality materials. I wear them almost everyday. Holding up nicely . Would buy again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Butler

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow of a width
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were sent back after opening them. They looked great and I was excited to get them, but the width was not wide enough so I was unable to wear them with any comfort and sent them back. I wish they would have fir because they looked exactly like I wanted a shoe to look, jut didn't have the fit I needed for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Tongue is absurdly puffy
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes it look like a normal shoe, but the tongue is overstuffed and puffy. Does not look good when wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, not well-constructed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the seams on either side by the toes split in the first month of wear. I wore them at work, so I put quite a few miles on them, but they didn't hold up nearly as well as other shoes (including a different pair of Osiris). It's a shame, because they're nice looking and comfortable, but they just aren't very durable.
customer_reviews.author: S Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes, Nice Fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, probably the best and most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. Very stylish, love them! Fit is a tiny bit smaller than expected, but nothing major. Would purchase again, and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grip!  I buy a pair of Protocols every year
customer_reviews.text: For BMX; these shoes have excellent durability and traction. They stick REALLY well on pedals, and clean up nice. I was so surprised at how well they performed, I bought a second pair after the 1st wore out (8-10 months of almost daily wear). A little bit wider than DC shoes that I own, and fit better than any other shoe I can remember.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought these back in July, they haven't held up since. Cannot return them now unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Hershey

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: The glue & stitching that holds the soles onto the shoes started coming undone 1-1.5 months after getting these. Unfortunately can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes but not a ton of padding.
customer_reviews.text: For $26 you can't go wrong. They're a lot better than Walmart shoes and they are only about $6 more.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and the colors, but it is way too small. not true to size, had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Pfifer

customer_reviews.title: Hmm, if I could fit the shoe that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Hmm, if I could fit the shoe that I bought a half size large, I'd review it. Dang these things run small. Go up a full size from your reg size to ensure fitment. Had to give them to my teenager.
customer_reviews.author: Turbo-Man

customer_reviews.title: Completely as expected, you get exactly what you order. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came in quickly, packaged very well and professionally. I don't want to say they ran small because there's a huge chance I could have converted incorrectly. They still fit great. They arrived quicker than expected and are overall great shoes. 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Osiris Protocal shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these shoes for my son. Surprised at the nice quality of the shoes and how it is made. My son loves these shoes and wears them all the time. Says they are very comfortable and not tight on his feet since he has a slightly wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: All looks and no substance
customer_reviews.text: "Ample padding".... ya right. I feel the smallest rock under my feet. The souls are uncomfortable at times. When I first got the shoes the souls had manufacture "bubbles" in the souls. They have since gone away since I have been wearing them daily and all day.. Honestly the style and looks are great. I wished I had just payed the extra money and bought VANS again. I was just trying to save some cash. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe I purchased as a gift for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe I purchased as a gift for my husband and grandson. Had to return both pair twice because these shoes do not fit as you would imagine. They are very small and tight on the foot. Too much cushion on the inside of the shoe makes you have to order a size or size and a half larger than what you would wear. Shoes are not comfortable and do not "break-in" easily. Would not recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Ruffin

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand all the problems with the shoe being extra stiff. This shoe was no worse than any other proper skating shoe. I have wide and well sweaty feet and in this shoe my feet are able to breathe reducing the foot-stink and that is a HUGE Plus. They have good grip on wet/slippery surfaces. Very Happy with the shoes!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ayres

customer_reviews.title: It's Too Small
customer_reviews.text: This shoe did not fit as sized; it was way too small, so I ordered the next size up thinking the shoe I received was the only one in the batch, but next size up felt like the same size I shoe I returned. I ultimately had to chose a different brand show which was unfortunate because I really liked the way this shoe looked.
customer_reviews.author: daphne rhodes

customer_reviews.title: beautiful vanilla color
customer_reviews.text: beautiful vanilla color, idk what the color is. I love this color. what is there to say!? I love the black laces, the weed color pattern on the sole and rim of the shoe, classy...lol, I can slip in and out of them no problem. The canvas material feels great and pretty sturdy. I will update this review within a couple of months to see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher  S. Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Cool Style, tight fit for American men.
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, tight fit. I wear size 12 and my toes go right up to the tip of these shoes. This shoe should be redesigned in leather, but the canvas style is still cool....
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rohan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Lasts daily use for about 12 months or more. Comfy and good quality
customer_reviews.author: derek m

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Shoe For Me
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are sized exactly so make sure you know your proper shoe size. I'm a 12 and these fit perfectly snug and comfortable. The ridges of the sole are stiff but the middle of the sole is soft, so you'll feel the pebbles and stones you step on. They're awesome shoes, very stylish and simple in design just the way I like them! Haven't had any problems with them what so ever!
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Nez

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice shoes but fit is way too small. I normally wear a 12 but after putting these on I'm not sure if a 14 would work, the main problem being a narrow toe.
customer_reviews.author: Bob H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Killer looking kicks! I bought my size and they fit perfect! I’m sure after a few skate sessions they’ll fit even better.
customer_reviews.author: T. Guerra

customer_reviews.title: If durability was what your after look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these shoes less than a month and they are already falling apart. The canvas is separating in areas behind the toe box and the lace holes are becoming ragged. I don't even skate I just like skate shoes because of the comfort. Fit of the shoe is good though and it's not very pigeon toed.
customer_reviews.author: Shovel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I hate to say this is the worse pair of Osiris i've ever gotten. I normally really like the brand however the sides ripped within 45 days and the Osiris logo fell off the back. They just seem like they were a lot cheaper put together then their shoes normally are. Not sure if I will go back to this brand after this.
customer_reviews.author: Nalshmire

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: God them for Christmas for my son he loved them
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Looks only...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is good if you wearing for looks. If your planning on skateboarding with them, don't. They already have begun to tear from one time use on my board.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey james and Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Sk8 or Die !
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes I've purchased so far . Always last a long time .
customer_reviews.author: JT Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality.
customer_reviews.text: If you use these for skateboarding they do not hold up. Used for a month and had to buy a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Cory R. Wright

customer_reviews.title: I loved these shoes at first
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes at first, but they completely fell apart with a very light amount of skating. The sole COMPLETELY detached from the shoe. Looks nice and feels nice at first, but quickly became apparent these are b-stock, a mess up in production, or just very very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Harris

customer_reviews.title: Maybe try on a pair in a retail outlet before you buy.  These seem to run small.
customer_reviews.text: These seem like they're well built shoes. I wore them part time for three days and they were just too small. I've passed them on to someone who usually wears a 9.5. In all fairness, it is not uncommon for me to need a wide these days. For the price, I thought I would try them out. I would have to say that these run small.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Melton

customer_reviews.title: Definitely met my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are exactly what I expected and live up to my expectations. They're really comfortable as most skate shoes are and the sizing was good. I maybe could've gone up a half size but none the less these fit well. The quality of the shoe is all in tact as well, none of the threads or any other part of the shoe were compromised, it's all in pristine condition.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton

customer_reviews.title: nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: nice looking shoe. good construction, just didn't fit that great. they have since kinda stretched out, so i can tolerate wearing them not for longer periods. glad they are real leather :)
customer_reviews.author: JUtah

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Stitching is great. Seams are good. Just fits a bit to big
customer_reviews.author: gallardosipes

customer_reviews.title: they feel good now, but was a much longer break in ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a week too get the shoe to stretch out too fit, they feel good now, but was a much longer break in than expected
customer_reviews.author: Garon Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Yay! Comfortable flat and medium width skate shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were exactly what I was looking for in color, fit and comfort. I normally wear women's 6.5, I buy men's or boys so I can have the width I prefer for comfort. These shoes fit what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Color is great
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and been a fan of Osiris for years. My only problem is the left shoe is a little tight . But aside from that it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stippich

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Update. Fell apart with light usage and no skateboarding within 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Kylus Fettermaximus

customer_reviews.title: Bought multiple pairs
customer_reviews.text: I’ve probably bought these shoes 3-4 times. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Decent shoe. Looks just like the picture. The soles on these shoes will not hold up to skating for too long. They are very thin, at work I walk on rocks in the desert every so often and I feel all the rocks through the shoe. I can see the soles on these wearing out fast from the grip tape if you use them for skating
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Peck

customer_reviews.title: Good seller
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and well protected, without any problem, recommended seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cheaply made I wouldn’t recommend them they didn’t last a month before the sole separated from the shoe won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Erica C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They run super small! buy a size bigger! Quality is great also style!
customer_reviews.author: Naty

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!  BUY 1 SIZE BIGGER!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad I read the reviews on these. I saw alot of comments saying that they run small so I ordered a size up. Glad I did because they fit great. My son says they go perfect with my mid life crisis.
customer_reviews.author: pat oconnor

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are great. But after wearing them a few times they ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great. But after wearing them a few times they got weird white spots around the toe. I am not sure if this is due to exposure, or if these shoes were new old stock, but you can brush it away with a damp cloth.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: I used to love Osiris shoes but the quality of this pair really ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to love Osiris shoes but the quality of this pair really makes me rethink the product they fit nice and I love the look and material but I've only had them for 6 months and they are completely falling apart I'm extremely disappointed in the durability of this shoe. I wear them as a daily shoe and the only active thing I do in them is a 49 hour work week
customer_reviews.author: Tyler L.

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for work and it has held up so far. It isnt very padded so I dont reccomend it for going to an amusement park or any sort unless you add memory foam into as cushion. Other words a great shoe for a good price. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: A little bit tight for 11.5 Osiris but brand new, perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Girlzero08

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 13 and it's a snug fit, I had to get a 14 with these and they fit as a 13 would in vans, fallen, emerica, etc. awesome shoe not too thin not too bulky. I wish more companies still made shoes like this but everyone is making socks with a rubber sole now days.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Morehouse

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes! Love how they Look!
customer_reviews.text: Notes: Buy 1 size larger fits snugged Pros Very padded. Love the Look from them... Conds - Not a Big fan of the Flat bottoms - Break-In REQUIRED. Hurts at the bottom of the lances...Goes away after couple days.
customer_reviews.author: J Day

customer_reviews.title: I was told they are nice, comfy but a little narrow in the toes
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift purchase. I was told they are nice, comfy but a little narrow in the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot and these didn't fit that's all
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my Grandson
customer_reviews.text: Not knowing how the fit was, I ordered his typical size and it fit perfect. Fast shipping. He was thrilled with the present.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hyslop

customer_reviews.title: Order a full size up.
customer_reviews.text: Sexy shoe, revived and was too small even after ordering a half size up. Go a full size up, I am 11 in every shoe almost. 11.5 was just too snug on my toes, I have the correct ones ordered and on the way. Can’t wait to skate them, even if they only last a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice leather show but my footl is a little wide and it was tight across the front...outside of that the inside is super comfortable and looks good...
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Carrino

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice, a little on the small side, but not enough to buy one size bigger to compensate. Great grip when i kick, and not too tacky on the grip tape on my deck. I'd buy'em again.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: After a couple days the shoes started to dig into the top of my feet. Was very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: shoes for my son, that only wear them indoors ...
customer_reviews.text: shoes for my son, that only wear them indoors and they came off the base so badly we tried everything from a glue gun to duct tape. Not the usually quality for this brand.
customer_reviews.author: missourimom

customer_reviews.title: They look good but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: They look good but not very durable. The Osiris emblem on the back started peeling off within a couple weeks of normal wear. They aren't extremely comfortable, even for a skate shoe. But, they were cheap so can't expect much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Definitely made to fit the price not the best material
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe looks solid but get a half size larger
customer_reviews.text: Tad bit tighter then size normals feels with most shoes
customer_reviews.author: Lupe

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, very comfortable. The only problem is the sole on the right shoe has started to come off twice now. Glued it back in the first time because they were so comfy. Left sole is completely intact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Never had this issue with Osiris before. Have been wearing same brand and model of shoes for years, and these are the first to have the soles fall off after less than a month
customer_reviews.author: kyle bogacki

customer_reviews.title: Schwing.
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly, my husband loves them. The colors are so bright and vivid and the reflective parts are kick ass.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh

customer_reviews.title: Sadly let down.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband and they only lasted a couple of months.... so disappointed because he loves these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Sempek

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks f()ukin bad ass, fits great - I recommend lacing them up “bar” style!
customer_reviews.author: Scotty!

customer_reviews.title: Had to throw them away since they were useless.
customer_reviews.text: Wore them for a week or 2 and they came apart from the sole on the inside and my whole foot was exposed. Had to throw them away since they were useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: As some of the reviews stated it is pretty cheaply made. The sole is starting to come off of the bottom after only 6 months and maybe 10 wears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They’re great shoes, he got them for Christmas too per his request
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday givt for my grandson and he loved them
customer_reviews.author: kimmie

customer_reviews.title: Not for a wide foot
customer_reviews.text: If you have a wide feet. Do not buy these shoes. Good quality, terrible fit for those of us with wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This particular model is on the smaller side
customer_reviews.text: Really good shoes, I have two other pairs of the same model, but on this on the size is on the smaller side compared to the two pairs I have. Other than that the shoes are comfortable and look great
customer_reviews.author: Prain19

customer_reviews.title: ... have a huge puffy tongue and they look nothing like in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: They have a huge puffy tongue and they look nothing like in the pictures, especially when they are on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I like how the shoe fits and looks, they dont hold up well at all, just everyday wearing ruined them in about 2-3weeks very cheaply made not suspected from a skate shoe, grip tape would destroy them in a day,
customer_reviews.author: Sophist

customer_reviews.title: They'd make good in house slippers
customer_reviews.text: Love the design they fit good comfortable to wear I even have a few different color pairs but the major down fall is they wear out so quick from just walking in them that I can't even skate in them. All of the ones I own have split away from the rubber soles in numerous places.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin fricke

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: same size as always buy and the shoe is smaller and not understand ..
customer_reviews.author: kristin gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Won't wear anything else!
customer_reviews.text: 14 yr old loves them.Got him 2 pair.He is tall for his age& very hard on shoes.These are the ONLY ones that fit & last & are comfortable enough to wear all day every day.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: says 14 but fit like a 13 or 12
customer_reviews.text: ordered a 14, says 14 but fit like a 13 or 12.5. My foot is really a 13.5 so 14 should always have plenty of room. was disappointed in the fit but kept them anyway bc they look so cool lol
customer_reviews.author: Allison

product_meta.title: Osiris Men's Protocol Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: This tried and true favorite never disappoints.
feature_bullets: Iconic styling with reinforced high abrasion areas for superior durability.
Lightweight padded tongue and collar for added comfort and support.
